Stello Boilerplate

Enjoy this silly static site build from the demo board.

The site has one page for each card on the board, plus this one to serve as a langing page.

Use the navigation links at the top of the page to get around or use the form below to search for content. The search is pretty silly but demonstrates a bit of non-trivial functionality. Click here to return to the main demos landing page.
